If the peace agreement is concluded, after the occupation is over, of course, there will probably be no such cost. #Azerbaijan

We are trying to solve the most painful problem for our country - the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict. #Azerbaijan
Azerbaijan's territorial integrity will be restored in any way. #Azerbaijan
For twenty years, the Azerbaijani people have proved to the whole world that we can live and develop as an independent state. #Azerbaijan
In recent years, no other country around the world has ever done much in Azerbaijan and achieved achievements.
